name: Path of the Giant
source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants
description: Barbarians who walk the Path of the Giant draw on the might of ancient giants, growing in stature and hurling massive weapons with devastating force.

10.name: Mighty Impel
10.description: You can hurl creatures or objects with incredible force, repositioning allies or enemies on the battlefield.
